task.name: Practice
task.text: There is no goal in the practice exercise! Just play around with the game and get familiar with how it works.

task.name: Four Shapes
task.text: If left alone, all the spinning shapes in this system will probably be destroyed. Your goal is to shift the state of the system so that the shapes multiply instead of being destroyed.

task.name: Four Shapes Round 2
task.text: Could you have done better? Try again! Make more spinning shapes as quickly as possible.

task.name: Chaos
task.text: Your shape is the circled shape in the middle of the screen. Your goal is to raise your shape's level as high as possible. Levels are gained by growing bigger.
